Class TreeNodeHelper

    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • isElementValid

        protected boolean isElementValid(int index)
        Description copied from class: ModelHelper
        Check if an element exists in the model. It is assumed that if an element exists, all elements with an index less than the given index and greater than or equal to zero are valid.
        Specified by:
        isElementValid in class ModelHelper
        Parameters:
        index - The element index.
        Returns:
        true if the element is valid.

      • isLeaf

        public boolean isLeaf()
        Check if the node is a leaf. See TreeModel.isLeaf(Object).
        Returns:
        true if a leaf, false if not.
